Key Match Events: India won by 6 wickets (with 15 balls remaining).
Pre-Game Insights: India's template in focus in final T20I series before T20 World Cup 2024.
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli are back in the T20I squad for the first time since India's semi-final loss to England at the 2022 T20 World Cup.
Kohli will miss Thursday's game because of personal reasons.
Head coach Rahul Dravid confirmed that Rohit and Yashasvi Jaiswal are India's first-choice openers in T20Is.
Afghanistan will play nine T20Is between now and the T20 World Cup.
Rashid Khan is part of the roster but will not play in the series as he continues to recover from back surgery.
Ibrahim Zadran will lead the side in Rashid Khan's absence.
Fazalhaq Farooqi, Naveen-ul-Haq and Mujeeb Ur Rahman are back in the national team and are expected to play a big role.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Out of 40 T20s Mohali has hosted in the last two years, the chasing team has won 26.
At night, it could get slightly foggy with the temperature dropping below 5°C.
India have now lost 11 tosses in a row.
Rohit needs 147 runs to become the second batter after Kohli to reach 4000 T20I runs.
Mohammad Nabi needs 123 runs and eight wickets to complete the double of 2000 runs and 100 wickets in T20Is.
Axar Patel is five short of 50 T20I wickets.
Others: Rinku Singh has made a good start in international cricket and he is playing really well, fulfilling the finisher's role.
Afghanistan aims to improve their batting skills, according to Ibrahim Zadran.
